episodes.title: Movin' On Over
episodes.synopsis: Meghan's moving in! Jon's a piece of shit! Grady's off the wall! Dave may or may not have cured cancer!

episodes.title: Snowed In
episodes.synopsis: The roommates get snowed in with a very special guest, and Grady does not react well to the confinement.

episodes.title: PSA
episodes.synopsis: Jon gets into some trouble with the law and is sentenced to make a Public Service Announcement as punishment.

cast.Gentleman Loser: Orangutan Massacre (as portrayed by Gentleman Loser)

episodes.title: Jailbreak
episodes.synopsis: Jon has just been released on parole, and he's ready to resume his life as a free man - but not if Detective Feeback Jones has anything to say about it.

episodes.title: Christmas Special
episodes.synopsis: Jon decides to teach that old Scrooge Wade Shaw the true meaning of Christmas.

episodes.title: Battle of the Bands
episodes.synopsis: To save Uncle Nagy's House - a legend is born.

episodes.title: Milk Challenge
episodes.synopsis: With the mayor in control of Uncle Nagy's House and Jon out on the street, the gang only has one chance left to save the day. That's right: they're having a milk challenge.

episodes.title: Hungry, Hungry Hobos
episodes.synopsis: A lesser known adventure from Jon's days as mayor of Olde Plagmanton. We shot this in 2007 as a DVD extra for the ultra-rare Uncle Nagy's House Season 1 DVD.

episodes.title: The Littlest Cat
episodes.synopsis: You've never seen a feline like this before! Ladies and gentleman, spoonfullofpoo.com presents the phantasmagorical first appearance of -- The Littlest Cat!

episodes.title: The Blind Date
episodes.synopsis: The return of Jon Tomlinson! A secret passion revealed! Grady the Mailman with a mustache! All this and more in today's action-packed installment of Uncle Nagy's House.

episodes.title: Uncle Nagy's Safe House
episodes.synopsis: In today's kaleidoscopic caper, our hero must brave the road less traveled. The road to -- Uncle Nagy's Safe House.

episodes.title: Buzz Aldrin & The Moon Man
episodes.synopsis: Uncle Nagy's Safe House is safe no more! Join Jon Tomlinson on his jeopardous journey to the farthest reaches of civilization and learn the terrible truth of Buzz Aldrin & The Moon Man.

episodes.title: John Lertch
episodes.synopsis: Behold a world not bound by the laws of physics. The world of... John Lertch, master of time!

episodes.title: Prestidigitation
episodes.synopsis: The fantastic return of Detective Feeback Jones! And -- what nefarious fate lurks behind the safehouse door? Find out in today's electrifying episode of Uncle Nagy's House!

episodes.title: The Littlest Valentine
episodes.synopsis: An Uncle Nagy's House Valentine's Day vignette!

episodes.title: Best Friends Forever (Part I)
episodes.synopsis: Days of Ansbach Past!

episodes.title: The Mixed Up Tale of  Rob Lowe and Paul T. Papajack
episodes.synopsis: The secret origin of Grady the Mailman!

episodes.title: The Baltimore Bumper Jump
episodes.synopsis: Get ready for a hair-raising hobo adventure with those delightful derelicts Les and Dutch!

episodes.title: Raspberry Jello
episodes.synopsis: The strange tale of Eyepatch Jon and Victor Bell!

episodes.title: The Dark Maverick Saga
episodes.synopsis: The Dark Maverick has emerged! Join us for the conclusion of episode 6's cataclysmic cliff hanger and the culmination of the first arc of Uncle Nagy's House Season 2!

episodes.title: The Kangaroo Incident
episodes.synopsis: An epic tale of muttonchops and marsupials from New Plagmanton's past!

episodes.title: Back And To The Left
episodes.synopsis: Who will guard the guards themselves? None, but the Mizan!

episodes.title: Butterdog Falls
episodes.synopsis: Out of New Plagmanton and into Butterdog Falls! Part one of Jon and Norman's rampageous road trip adventure.

episodes.title: Free Comic Book Day
episodes.synopsis: May 2nd is Free Comic Book Day at Wayne's Comic Madness!

episodes.title: The Littlest Cancellation
episodes.synopsis: Jon and Norman's trip to Twin Springs is further diverted by the startling news that The Littlest Cat has been canceled by SFOP TV.

episodes.title: Meet the Mavericks
episodes.synopsis:
In which The Maverick meditates on family, future, and all that shit.

(This episode was created as part of the 2009 Philadelphia 48 Hour Film Project.)

episodes.title: Trinitiation
episodes.synopsis: The Pink Stilettos has a new leader.

episodes.title: The Complete Works of Boatzart
episodes.synopsis: Jon's journey of self-discovery comes to a head at Todd Hendrixson's estate.

episodes.title: The Good, the Bad and the Denim
episodes.synopsis: Flash back to Grady's first mission with the Pink Stilettos.

episodes.title: Series Finale
episodes.synopsis: A wanted man, Jon heads to Twin Springs in search of Nagy’s letter. What he finds sets him on a collision course with Uncle Nagy himself. Meanwhile, the Maverick eats some hamburgers.
